First Post!

Created: Oct 24, 2010 05:40 PM
Updated: Oct 24, 2010 06:45 PM
Author: Peter Herndon
Categories: Uncategorized

Hi everyone. It's been a long while, and rebooting of the blog is now in full swing. With this, my first post using my new blog system, we're working with a bunch of new technologies:

  • Django 1.2.3
  • django-sentry
  • django-staticfiles
  • django-taggit
  • memcached
  • pylibmc
  • django-newcache
  • gunicorn
  • nginx
  • supervisord
